Home.subtitle: Blockchain Bet Brasil - The Web3 BBB.
Home.subtext: Rewriting destinies through mathematics. No walls, no owner control.
Home.pulseText: The prize ALWAYS has an owner. Win with 5, 4, 3, 2 or 1 point!
Home.description: Application without intermediaries. No manipulation. The first decentralized distribution system operated entirely by Smart Contracts and Chainlink VRF on the Base network.
Home.card1Desc: The contract has no owner. Rules cannot be changed, and withdrawals cannot be paused.
Home.card3Desc: 90% of the total collected per round is locked for immediate distribution. We play on your side.

ComoFunciona.title: The 625 Matrix
ComoFunciona.desc: Success is a calculation. Our system uses a 25x25 reference grid, creating 625 strategic possibilities.
ComoFunciona.step1Desc: Every entry generates a BaseScan link. Your numbers are saved in the block forever.
ComoFunciona.step2Desc: On BaseScan, scroll to Overview and click the Decode Input Data button.
ComoFunciona.step3Desc: Once confirmed, not even developers can change your bet.
ComoFunciona.card1Desc: Choose 5 coordinates. Your selection order determines your tier.
ComoFunciona.card2Desc: Rounds close every Saturday with on-chain audit via Chainlink VRF.
ComoFunciona.card3Desc: On Sundays, the prize is released directly to your wallet.

Beginners.title: New to Web3? We've got you covered.
Beginners.desc: Blockchain technology is actually your ultimate security. Understand it in seconds:
Beginners.walletDesc: Imagine a banking app where ONLY YOU have the password and total control.
Beginners.blockchainDesc: Blockchain ensures no one can change the rules or vanish with the prize.
Beginners.basescanDesc: Your digital receipt. Transparent, auditable, and impossible to forge.

Premiacao.title: PRIZES
Premiacao.desc: A fair protocol: 90% reward rate per round. No middlemen.
Premiacao.matrixDesc: 25x25 grid. The highest winning probability ever designed.
Premiacao.payoutDesc: 90% of everything collected is allocated to prizes.
Premiacao.cascadeDesc1: If the top tier has no winners, the value flows down immediately.
Premiacao.distributionDesc: Calculated based on 90% of the total collected per round.
Premiacao.distributionNote: The gross prize is equivalent to 90% of total amount collected, per round.
Premiacao.rolloverDesc1: If no one scores, the next round receives a +40% bonus.
